question: Which one among the following Indian rivers originates in Maharashtra and flows through Karnataka and Andhra Pradesh and drains into the Bay of Bengal in Andhra coast?
explanation: Krishna river (1,290km) originates in the western ghats near Mahabaleshwar (Maharashtra). It flows through the states of Maharashtra, Karnataka and Andhra Pradesh before draining in the Bay of Bengal near Hamasaladeevi in Andhra Pradesh.
